de.bpmnaftool.model.transformation
Class Utilities

java.lang.Object
  de.bpmnaftool.model.transformation.Utilities

public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains static helper methods which are used for the transformation, but do not transform anything by itself.

Author:
Felix Härer

Constructor Detail

Utilities

public Utilities()
Method Detail

setProgress

static void setProgress(BpmnModel model,
                        Pool currentPool)
Calculates current transformation progress and sets it in the View

Parameters:
model - Model that is being transformed
currentPool - pool that is currently transformed

getConditions

static java.lang.String[] getConditions(BpmnModel bpmnModel,
                                        GatewaySplit gateway)
Retrieves all conditions of the outgoing SequenceFlows of the given GatewaySplit and stores them in a string array. If outgoing SequenceFlows of an exclusive split have no conditions, it creates them (integer numbers).

Parameters:
bpmnModel - model where Gateway is located
gateway - Gateway where conditions are to be retrieved
Returns:
string array with conditions

getNodeName

static java.lang.String getNodeName(BpmnModel model,
                                    FlowObject object)
Returns the prefix for a FlowObject. The prefix is a short version of the pool/lane name and optionally a prefix for the specific node type (e.g. special prefix for Event).

Parameters:
object - object to get prefix for
Returns:
short name of pool and lane

getSwimLanePrefix

static java.lang.String getSwimLanePrefix(SwimLane swimLane,
                                          SwimLane[] swimLanes)
Returns a shortened version of a Pool or lane name. A short name uses only the minimum number of characters needed to produce different names.

Parameters:
swimLane - SwimLane whose name is to be shortened
swimLanes - Array of all existing SwimLanes for name comparison
Returns:
shortened name OR empty String if only one SwimLane

isEndEventWithoutMessageFlows

static boolean isEndEventWithoutMessageFlows(BpmnModel model,
                                             FlowObject object)
Returns true if the given object is and EndEvent and does not have any incoming or outgoing MessageFlows.

Parameters:
model - Model where object is located
object - object to check
Returns:
true if object is an EndEvent without MessageFlows

isEndEvent

static boolean isEndEvent(FlowObject object)
Returns true if the given object is an EndEvent

Parameters:
object - object to check
Returns:
true if object is EndEvent

getLoopEnd

static FlowObject getLoopEnd(FlowObject[] parents,
                             Node parentA,
                             Node parentB,
                             Node lastAfNode,
                             FlowObject loopStart)

getNextGateway

static FlowObject[] getNextGateway(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                   FlowObject fObject)
Traverses the graph beginning with the given object and returns the next Gateway and its parent

Parameters:
sourceModel - model where traversal happens
fObject - object where traversal starts
Returns:
array where index 0 is the Gateway and index 1 its parent

getGatewayCluster1Paths

static java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> getGatewayCluster1Paths(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                                                   Gateway gateway)
This method traverses all possible paths starting from Gateway and ending with an activity (first one found). During the traversal, all sequence flows are stored (the Path from Gateway to any activity). All Paths are stored in a list.

Parameters:
sourceModel - BpmnModel where traversal happens (graph)
gateway - Gateway to start with (start node)
Returns:
All possible paths to all activities (path as list of Sequence Flows)

getPathsToAllActivities

private static void getPathsToAllActivities(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                            Gateway gateway,
                                            SequenceFlow[] path,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> pathList)
This is a helper method to find all paths to activities starting from a Gateway. For further information see the method getPathsToAllActivities(BpmnModel sourceModel, Gateway gateway)

Parameters:
sourceModel - BpmnModel where traversal happens (graph)
gateway - Gateway to start with (start node)
path - Current Path (recursion)
pathList - All possible paths to all activities (path as list of Sequence Flows)

checkGatewayParents

static boolean checkGatewayParents(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                   Gateway splitGateway)
Check if the parent of Gateway is a gateway itself. If this is the case, it returns false, otherwise true.

Parameters:
sourceModel - Model where overlapping Gateway are to be resolved
splitGateway - Gateway to resolve
Returns:
true if parent it not a gateway, false otherwise
